config._comment: Relation sink configuration for US Covid Daily topics
config.neo4j.topic.cypher.topic_arptoarp: MATCH (a1:Airport {iata_code: event.airport_1}), (a2:Airport {iata_code: event.airport_2}) CREATE (a1)-[r:A2A {year: event.year, quarter: event.quarter, nsmiles: event.nsmiles, passengers: event.passengers, fare: event.fare}]->(a2)
config.neo4j.topic.cypher.topic_ctytoarp: MERGE (c:County{county_fips: event.fips}) MERGE (a:Airport{iata_code: event.iata}) MERGE (c)-[r:C2A]-(a) SET r.distance = ROUND(TOFLOAT(event.distance)/1000)
